marklogic.body: Agreed. Let's face it: They've given up. Yep, an inexperienced goalie was thrown into the mix - so they should have lost 7-5 instead of 7-1. But the Flyers could have tossed Bernie Parent in net and the results would have been the same. That was as a shameful a display of surrender as you are gonna see. The Habs were eliminated before the Leafs, but they go out and give it every nite - which means they will doubtless finish ahead of Toronto and out of a lottery Spot for the draft. Stupid strategically, but at least they haven't thrown in the towel. (And before you all start howling at me, let me make it clear that I am, have been, and Always will be, a Montreal fan, I have been living down here so long these bloody Leafs have grown on me to the point where I pull for them every game except those against Montreal). I want the league's two premier franchises to be vital,competitive contenders - I have a loooong wait, I fear. Face it, Habs and Leaf fans: We suck ...
